articles.title: Jail for man who shared obscene pictures with 25000 Telegram members - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Four men involved in a Telegram group linked to a notorious website that facilitates the sharing of lewd videos and images were arrested by the police, with one of them slapped with a prison sentence on Wednesd…

articles.title: Asian Champions Trophy Hockey: Misfiring India held to 2-2 draw by fighting Korea - Times of India
articles.description: Hockey News: Defending champions and Olympic bronze-medallists India were held to a 2-2 draw by a fighting Korea in their opening match of the Hero Asian Champions
articles.content: Asian Champions Trophy Hockey: Misfiring India held to 2-2 draw by fighting Korea
